column4: you are trying to burn a dvd from the livecd, which will write a large temp file.  How much ram.. Sorry, I am a little slow and confused tonight
not from a LiveCD, this is a full install. I've got 2 GiB of RAM, but that's not enough to cache the entire ISO before burning
this really wouldn't be a problem, but it looks like some bug is preventing nautilus-cd-burner from reading the appropriate gconf key
Sorry I saw your comment to sethk and thought you were talking about your system running live..
